data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Entre Ríos, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Entre Ríos, Argentina
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Entre Ríos, Argentina to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Entre Ríos, Argentina will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, encourage the 128,005 believers in Entre Ríos to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Entre Ríos, Argentina.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Entre Ríos, Argentina.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.section_summary:
the state of Entre Ríos, Argentina has a population of 1,158,100.

We estimate Entre Ríos has 128,005 people who might know Jesus, 950,287 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 79,808 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Entre Ríos, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
